title: How to Make Orange Blossom Water Fruit Salad

steps.headline: Peel the oranges and cut them into quarters.
Peel the kiwifruit and cut it into pieces.
Peel the banana and cut it into slices.
Mix all of the fruits together in the salad bowl.
Sprinkle the orange blossom water over the top and gently mix through.
Finish up by sprinkling a little vanilla sugar over the top.
Place the fruit salad in the fridge to chill for at least 1 hour prior to serving.

text: Peel the oranges and cut them into quarters.  Wash the strawberries and apples. Cut them into pieces. Peel the kiwifruit and cut it into pieces.  Peel the banana and cut it into slices.  Mix all of the fruits together in the salad bowl.  Sprinkle the orange blossom water over the top and gently mix through.  Finish up by sprinkling a little vanilla sugar over the top.  Place the fruit salad in the fridge to chill for at least 1 hour prior to serving.  Finished.
